com.scalar.dl.ledger.contract

Class ContractLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • com.scalar.dl.ledger.contract.ContractLoader

  • @Immutable
public class ContractLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    A class loader for a Contract from its bytecode.

    The defineClass method in this class creates an instance of the Contract or the ContractBase class from its corresponding bytecode. It only grants the given permissions with ProtectionDomain.

        Turns the bytecode of a registered contract into an instance of class Class.
